mapper.select: select tmc.*, td.device_name, tu.display_name, th.hospital_name,tdm.dept_name from tb_inspection_case as tmc left join tb_device as td on td.device_id = tmc.device_id left join tb_hospital as th on td.hospital_id = th.hospital_id left join tb_department as tdm on td.dept_id = tdm.dept_id left join tb_user as tu on tmc.assignee_user_id = tu.user_id where tmc.case_id = #{caseId}
select tr.role_name from tr_user_role as tur inner join tb_role as tr on tur.role_id = tr.role_id where tur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_inspection_case ( case_subject, case_remark, inspection_type, case_state, device_id, assignee_user_id, device_on_state, device_elec_evn_state, device_func_state, device_param_input, inspection_time, inspection_remark, create_time, creater, modify_time, modifier ) values ( #{caseSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspectionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{assigneeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceOnState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceElecEvnState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceFuncState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceParamInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_timestamp(#{inspectionTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{inspectionRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
